summary: A well thought out mod of mine that makes all shout VOICES from the game (except essential ones like bosses/thatonerottendragonbro Totally Silent, so now you can hear the SFX (wind,fire,etc) instead of their repetitive voice files
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------
TL;DR makes annoying words stop being spoken.
install manually or with NMM

A well thought out mod of mine that makes all shout VOICES from the game (except essential ones like bosses/thatonerottendragonbro
Totally Silent, so now you can hear the SFX (wind,fire,etc) instead of their repetitive voice files
----------------------------------------------------------------
Replaces ALL shout voices for ALL races for ALL dlc's
That includes -
-Skyrim Shouts
-Dawnguard shouts
-Dragonborn shouts
----------------------------------------------------------------
A mod by me, Enjoy

----
Please report any problems with the mod in the comments sections ,although it should be nearly impossible to have any problems with this mod.. , and positive feedback is appreciated.
author: torcher
